summary: The diff implements a new Project Gallery section with 6 responsive images, relative asset paths, modal preview behavior, and updates header/footer navigation to scroll to the gallery. Two additional changes appear unrelated to the gallery request (UTM tracking code in Footer and an empty React Query hooks placeholder).

hallucinated_features.description: Added UTM tracking/app identifier logic in the footer (hostname-based encodeURIComponent)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a Project Gallery section and update navigation; tracking/UTM functionality was not requested and is not required for gallery placement or links.
evidence: frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx ("Generate app identifier for UTM tracking")

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder React Query hooks file (useQueries.ts)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions React Query or adding placeholder hook files; the gallery is explicitly static and requires no backend/data hooks.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks")
